TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Piyuma, title = Piyuma, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Piyuma} }

S.FORM: Piyuma Itiniay i Taiwu Cen no Pingtung ko Piyuma a niyaro', 168 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 716 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 98 ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 702 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 2 ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 14 ko tamdaw. O pa sin to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Paiwan93 , Amis1 , roma3 . Ira ko picodadan( , ) i niyaro'.
